title: Environmental Impact Assessment of Natural Resource Projects
overview: This course covers the basic knowledge and skills related to the analysis and environmental impact assessment of natural resource projects. It guides students through the nature, role, methods, and community involvement in environmental impact assessment of natural resource projects.

skill_outcomes.skill_name: Understanding and Applying Environmental Impact Assessment
skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will be able to understand and apply the principles of environmental impact assessment to natural resource projects.
Students will be able to analyze the environmental impacts of natural resource projects.

minimum_entry_skills.skill_name: Basic Understanding of Environmental Impact Assessment
